name: Sniper Showdown Tournament
description: Test your sniper skills in this intense Sniper Elite 4 tournament. Precision and stealth are your keys to victory.

name: PC Master Race Clash
description: A celebration of PC gaming with tournaments in popular PC titles, overclocking competitions, and hardware showcases.

name: Speed Racers Grand Prix
description: Compete in high-speed races in Gran Turismo 7 and claim the title of Speed Racers Grand Prix champion.

name: IndieGame Expo 2024
description: IndieGame Expo 2024 celebrates indie game developers. Play unique indie titles, attend developer panels, and support the indie gaming community.

name: FantasyCon 2024
description: FantasyCon 2024 is a magical journey into the world of fantasy gaming. Experience LARPing, tabletop RPGs, and immersive fantasy realms.

name: Mobile Gaming Clash
description: Compete in mobile gaming tournaments featuring popular titles like PUBG Mobile, Call of Duty: Mobile, and Clash Royale.
